definitions.definition: A toxic colourless liquid organic compound , CH 2 =CH.CN, synthesized from propylene and ammonia ; used as a monomer in the production of acrylic resins and synthetic rubber .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) A toxic colourless liquid organic compound , CH 2 =CH.CN, synthesized from propylene and ammonia ; used as a monomer in the production of acrylic resins and synthetic rubber .
